en.title: Your divorce
en.name: Name
en.youCanNowFinaliseYourDivorce: You can now finalise your divorce
en.mainBody: The 6 week waiting period has passed. You can now complete the divorce and get a decree absolute.
en.whenYouNeedToApplyBy: When you need to apply by
en.detail1: You can apply for your decree absolute any time from now. If you apply after {{ case.dateCaseNoLongerEligibleForDA | date }} (1 year after the decree nisi was granted) you’ll have to explain the delay to the court.
en.detail2: The court can cancel (legally known as rescind) the decree nisi any time up until the decree absolute is granted, if it’s given new evidence showing why you shouldn't be given a divorce.
en.detail4: Your {{ case.divorceWho }} can apply for the decree absolute from {{ case.dateRespondentEligibleForDA | date }} (3 months after you can). If your {{ case.divorceWho }} applies you’ll both need to go to a court hearing.

daRequested.daRequestedTitle: Your {{ petitionerInferredRelationship }} has applied for Decree Absolute
daRequested.daRequestedDescription: This application is subject to checks to ensure there are no outstanding applications or other matters that require completion before the divorce is finalised. If there are no outstanding applications or other matters that require completion, the court will issue your decree absolute, and your divorce will be complete.

divorceGranted.divorceComplete: The court has now issued your decree absolute, and your divorce is complete.
divorceGranted.decreeAbsoluteDownloadLink: Download your decree absolute ({{ decreeAbsoluteFile.fileType | upper }}).
divorceGranted.daDownloadSubText: Print your certificate. You will need to show it if you get married again. You can also use it to change your name, for example with your bank.
divorceGranted.daCertLength: Your certificate will be stored here for one year. If you need a copy of your certificates after this date, you'll need to contact the court.

en.howRespondsLink: How your {{ case.divorceWho }} responds
en.decreeNisiLink: Decree nisi
en.decreeAbsoluteLink: Decree absolute
en.childrenAndDivorceLink: Children and divorce
en.moneyAndPropertyLinky: Money and property
en.downloadAndSaveYourDocuments: Download and save all the documents for this application before you continue. If you do amend your application, you won’t be able to access any of these documents online anymore.
